attributes.action: Make nightclubs/bars safer for women e.g. searches at the door.
attributes.background: I would like the government to enforce searches at the doors of all "nightlife" venues across the U.K., e.g. bars, pubs and clubs. It is becoming increasingly harder for women to feel safe and the rise in spiking via needle is too far and too much for nothing to be done about it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Make it a legal requirement for nightclubs to thoroughly search guests on entry
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598986
